children.value: To enable sound for your PagerDuty notifications, you will need to assign both High and Low Urgency notifications a ringtone. In the PagerDuty app, you can do this from the :fa-bars: :fa-arrow-right:
By default, low urgency notifications will be silent
. With the notification sounds set and no other settings enabled, the PagerDuty notifications will also be muted when your phone is set to Do Not Disturb or when your volume is muted.

Bypassing Do Not Disturb on Android 8"
As of Android 8, bypassing Do Not Disturb can be less intuitive since there may be additional steps to set it up successfully.

Critical Alerts for iOS allow push notifications to bypass an iPhoneâ€™s DND and silent mode settings. You can allow high urgency incidents to map to Critical Alerts and bypass

Alternatively, you can enable Critical Alerts by navigating to your device
and toggle the option within the PagerDuty app notification settings.
iOS: Configure PagerDuty phone calls to bypass Do Not Disturb"

MIUI and EMUI (Huawei and Xiaomi devices)"
For these particular forks of Android, you may not be able to set sounds from the respective High and Low Urgency Notification Settings. Instead, you may need to navigate to:
Make sure High and Low Urgency Notifications are enabled
From here, tap either High or Low Urgency to choose your sound.
OnePlus devices running on OS 10 do not fully support Override System Volume. These devices will not always override the system volume when the phone is on silent or vibrate mode.
